summary: The 'Ban Harmful Food Dyes Act' (H.R. 4858) amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act. It deems food containing specific color additives (Red No. 40, Red No. 3, Yellow No. 5, etc., along with similar additives) as adulterated, effectively banning their use in food. The ban is slated to take effect January 1, 2027.
